WorkItem.Description: keyboard shortcut like ctr+f9, and alt+f9 are not working .. it opens some webpage when i press ctr+f9.. full screen does not fit to every corner of screen on laptop.. it leaves black space on both right and  left sides..

Comments.Message:
Please confirm that, you are using latest version of Turbo C++. Please download the latest version from here https://turboc.codeplex.com.

If you continue facing the same problem, please use the alternate file menu shortcut
Ctrl+F9 ->  Alt+R+Enter

You can find out more Turbo C++ shortcuts here
[https://turboc.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Turbo%20CPP%20Shortcuts](https://turboc.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Turbo%20CPP%20Shortcuts)
